page.title: 14SHOPPING
page.content: Every Monday and Friday, at about half past three,the baker's van comes round.He sells crisps,pasties,tinned vegetables,cornflakes,coffee,tea and eggs ,as well as bread and teacakes. On Wednesday the grocer's van comes.He sells fruit, vegetables, fizzy drinks and groceries. The butcher comes on a Thursday morning.He sells liver, beef, pork, chicken, meat pies and eggs. The butcher has the smallest van.It is a sort of car with a raised back,like a boot with shelves.You can get inside the baker's van and the butcher's van. It is easier for my mum to shop at the vans because she can't drive, so she can't get to the proper shops.
